text:
#pm
Nano-Tera kompaniyasiga  Project manager kerak 

Majburiyatlar:¬†
Loyihani boshqarish
Dasturchilarga vazifa berish va qabul qilib olish
Ish davomida qandaydir muammo chiqib qolsa aytib yoki o'zi hal qila olishi kerak
Aloqaga chiqsangiz, yana ham tushuntirib beramiz.

Talablar:
3 - 4 yil ishlagan bo'lishi¬†yani mayda loyihalarda emas ,kattaroq loyihalarda qatnashgan va uzi qilgan bulishi kerak
Yoshi farqi yo'q¬†
Erkak kishi bo'lishi kerak
Ish formati: Offline. Yarim stavkani ham √≤ylab kursa bo'ladi. Abetgacha yoki abetdan so'ng.
Maosh: 15-20 mln

Murojaat uchun: @lays_goziy¬†
Tel: +998992442444


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#python #mentor
FinTechHub o'quv markazi Backend-Python mentor qidirmoqda 

Oylik : 7 mlndan

Talablar: 
- 2 yillik ish tajribasi
- Python
- OOP, SOLID, KISS, DRY
- Authentication, Authorization
- Algoritmlar (sorting, searching) va ma'lumotlar tuzilmalari (data structures)
- Asynchronous, multithreading, multiprocessing kodlar yoza olishi
- Unit test, integration test, load test, E2E testlar bo'yicha tajribaga ega bo'lishi
- Logging, debugging lardan amalda foydalana olish
- PostgreSQL, MySQL and NoSQL
- Linux operatsion tizimida ishlay olish (aynan serverlar uchun Linux tizim), masalan Ubuntu, Debian
- Nginx yoki Apache HTTP serverlarni bilishi
- Docker bo'yicha tajribaga ega bo'lish, dasturlarni konteynerizatsiya usulida ishga tushira olish tajribasi bo'lishi
- CI/CD bo'yicha tajriba
- Agile/Scrum kabi metodoliyalarda tajriba
- HTTP, SSL, DNS, REST, OpenAPi larni tushunishi
- Git, SSH, Bashscriptlarni bilishi
- Code review, static code analyzer lar bo'yicha tajriba


Resume
@FinTech_Admin


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

@Lays_goziy

Uzoq muddatli loyiha uchun 3,4 yil tajribaga ega bulgan middle darajadagi .net dasturchi qidirilmoqda,
Ish turi ofline, CV talab qilinadi.

#pm
Exciting Remote Job Opportunity! 

Are you a seasoned IT Project Manager looking for your next challenge? Look no further! Apps Do Wonders is extending a golden opportunity for individuals ready to spearhead the creation of groundbreaking extensions for Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint, all powered by artificial intelligence (OpenAI, ChatGPT). And the cherry on top? A handsome salary of $1500 net awaits!
What Will You Be Doing?
As a pivotal member of our team, you'll be engaged in a variety of tasks across project management, customer support, product development, and marketing:

Project Management
 ‚Ä¢ Lead project planning, execution, and delivery with a keen eye for detail and efficiency.
 ‚Ä¢ Coordinate cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure project success.
 ‚Ä¢ Monitor project progress, identify risks, and implement effective mitigation strategies.
 ‚Ä¢ Utilize your expertise to streamline processes and optimize project outcomes.
Customer Support
 ‚Ä¢ Promptly respond to customer emails, ensuring satisfaction and problem resolution.
 ‚Ä¢ Assist users in troubleshooting issues and guide them through product adoption.
 ‚Ä¢ Craft engaging training videos and helpful articles to enhance user experience.

Product Development
 ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in refining product requirements, ensuring they align with customer needs.
 ‚Ä¢ Contribute to product testing and releases to maintain top-notch quality.
 ‚Ä¢ Utilize tools like Grafana and Google Analytics for product usage analysis and dashboards.
 ‚Ä¢ Engage in insightful research and data gathering to drive product innovation.
Marketing
 ‚Ä¢ Maintain the website, ensuring it remains current and appealing to visitors.
 ‚Ä¢ Produce compelling articles and blog content to drive engagement and brand visibility.
What Skills and Experience Are We Seeking?
 ‚Ä¢ Minimum of 3 years of experience in IT project management, demonstrating a track record of successful project delivery.
 ‚Ä¢ Solid proficiency in Excel, Grafana, and Google Analytics.
 ‚Ä¢ Strong command of English (Upper-Intermediate level or higher) for seamless communication with clients.
 ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Russian is a must as our team operates in Russian.
 ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with SaaS products to hit the ground running in our dynamic environment.


Join us at Apps Do Wonders, where innovation knows no bounds, and your talents are celebrated! If you're ready to embark on an exhilarating journey in tech, send in your application today!  Send your CV: @MKB_MokhiraKodirova


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#bi 
Najot Ta‚Äôlim markazi BI mutaxassisini qidirmoqda!

Ish grafigi: To'liq stavka
Maosh: 3-10 mln

Talablar: 
- O‚Äôzbek tilida erkin muloqot qila olish
- Analitik fikrlash va murakkab muammolarni hal qilish qobiliyati
- BI, statistika  yoki amaliy matematika kabi tegishli sohada o‚Äôqigan bo‚Äôlish
- SQL va mashhur DBMS bilan ishlash bo'yicha bilim va amaliy tajriba
- Ma'lumotlarni vizualizatsiya qilish va vizualizatsiya vositalaridan foydalanish tajribasi (masalan, Tableau, Power BI)
- Har qanday BI vositasi (Qlik, Power BI, Tableu, SAP BI, Oracle BI) bilan tajribaga ega bo'lish avfzal ko‚Äôriladi
- Ma'lumotlardagi tendentsiyalar va anomaliyalarni aniqlash uchun tanqidiy fikrlash va muammolarni hal qilish qobiliyatlari
- Biznes sohasi, sohaga oid ko'rsatkichlar va KPI'larni tushunish
- Turli auditoriya uchun texnik tushunchalarni texnik bo'lmagan tilga tarjima qilish qobiliyati

Majburiyatlar:
- Jarayonlarni avtomatlashtirishni rivojlantirish
- BI platformasida hisobotlarni yaratish va qo'llab-quvvatlash
- Ma'lumotlar sifatini monitoring qilish va hisobotlarni o'z vaqtida yangilash
- Ma'lumotlarni vizualizatsiya qilish: statistika va katta ma'lumotlarni aniq xulosalar va vizual grafiklarga o‚Äôtkazish

Biz sizga taklif qilamiz:
- Til o'rganish va kitob sotib olish uchun chegirmalar
- Qarindoshlaringizni IT sohalarida o'qitish uchun chegirma
- Kontrakt to'lovingizni oylikdan ushlab qolish sharti bilan bir martada, oldindan to'lab beramiz
- 300 dan ortiq mutaxassislar bilan networking
- Turli mavzularda maxsus master-classlar
- Samaradorlikka ko'ra oylik maoshning oshishi
- Kuchli, ahil jamoa!

Ariza topshirish uchun havola


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#engineeringmanager #leadership
Senior Engineering Manager at Super Dispatch!

Location: Anywhere in the World 

About the Role:

- As the Senior Engineering Manager, you'll lead a dynamic team of 5-15 engineers and team leads, driving the growth of Super Dispatch's products. 
- Your role involves managing people, overseeing execution, and delivering business value. With your technical expertise and strong leadership, you'll shape the direction of the team and drive technical excellence.

Requirements:

- 4 years of team management experience (or equivalent)
- 5 years of strong technical background (in Python)
- Advanced English 

What We Offer:

- Generous salary package around $6-10k
- Unlimited vacation days 
- Gym membership 
- English language courses 
- Remote or office-based work options 
- Plus, many more perks!

Apply here : https://superdispatch.breezy.hr/p/caa83c351b7d-senior-engineering-manager

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to take your career to the next level with Super Dispatch! Apply now!


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#datascientist
Data Scientist at Super Dispatch!

Location: Central Asia

About the Role:

- Responsible for building and evolving real-time marketplace pricing engines using machine learning and adapting to market changes. 
- Collaborate with stakeholders to enhance existing recommendation engines and develop a deep understanding of the auto transport industry to improve machine learning models and provide thought leadership to product and engineering teams. Additionally, seeking someone with strong technical skills to handle data unloading, processing, uploading, release management, and proficiency in DevOps tools.

Requirements:

- 3-4 years of experience
- Python & SQL
- ML Frameworks & cloud experience 
- Good English level

What We Offer:

- Generous salary package around $3-5,5k
- Unlimited vacation days 
- Gym membership 
- English language courses 
- Remote or office-based work options 
- Plus, many more perks!

Apply here : https://superdispatch.breezy.hr/p/fe7e427eefb9-data-scientist

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to take your career to the next level with Super Dispatch! Apply now!


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#techsupport #windows #linux #cybersecurity
Kompaniya: Datagaze - kiberxavfsizlik yo'nalishida 5+ yil tajribaga ega bo'lgan milliy kompaniya.

Loyiha: Datagaze DLP - tashkilotlarning korporativ tarmog'idan konfidensial ma'lumotlarning sizib chiqishini oldini olish va xodimlar faoliyatini nazorat qilish tizimi.

Lavozim: Texnik ko'makchi.

Vakolat: Mijoz tashkilotlar bilan ishlash. Tashkilot xodimlarini Datagaze DLP tizimi bilan ishlashga o'rgatish. Loyiha doirasida kerakli dasturlarni o'rnatish, sozlash va diagnostika qilish. Mijozlardan kelayotgan texnik yo'nalishdagi murojaatlar bilan ishlash.

Talablar:
- Windows OS texnik muammolarini diagnoz qilish. Windows OS loglari, fayl strukturalari, tizimli sozlamalari va xavfsizlik sozlamalarini bilish talab etiladi. Active Directory Domain Controller va Group Policy Objectlar haqida bilish qo'shimcha ustunlik beradi.
- Linux OS terminalida erkin ishlash, Linux OS loglari, fayl strukturalari, tizimli sozlamalari va xavfsizlik sozlamalarini bilish talab etiladi.
- Tarmoq texnologiyalari haqida boshlang'ich bilimlarga ega bo'lish, Linux/Windows OS birida tarmoq sozlamalarini yaxshi bilish talab etiladi.
- Tarmoq va tizim administratorligi bo'yicha boshlang'ich bilimlar bo'lishi maqsadga muvofiq.

Bandlik: Ofisda, 6/1 rejimda to'liq ish kuni.

Til: O'zbek va rus tillarini bilish talab etiladi.

Tajriba: 1+ yil ish faoliyati talab etiladi.

Maosh: $500+.

Ish sharoiti: Unikal va qiziqarli loyiha, Toshkent markazida qulay va shinam ofis, o'z vaqtida maosh, yosh va do'stona jamoa, shaxsiy rivojlanish uchun imkoniyatlar va h.k.

Batafsil: Boshqa tafsilotlar yuzma-yuz suhbatda muhokama qilinadi.

Amaliyot: Diqqat! Hozirda talabalar va yangi o'rganuvchilar uchun amaliyot (stajirovka) yo'q.

CV ni qabul qilish: @datagaze_pm


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#frontend #mentor
Tramplin IT Akademiyasi Frontend mentor qidirmoqda 

Oylik : 5 mln - 15 mln

Tajriba 2+

- HTML, Semantics, Accessibility
- CSS, SASS, BEM, CSS Modules, CSS-in-JS, Tailwind, Responsive Design, Design Systems
- JavaScript, TypeScript
- Web Platform APIs
- React or Vue or Angular
- Tooling: bundlers, transpilers, linting, formatting, asset handling and optimisation, performance considerations, codebase organisation and monorepos, deployment and package publishing
- Testing: unit, integration, snapshot, visual, e2e, framework specific libraries
- Server side rendering
- HTTP, WebSockets/SSE
- Continious Integration, Continious Delivery
- Git, gitflow, trunk based development
- Refactoring legacy code
- Working with design tools
- Authoring documentation
- Planning and estimations
- Soft skills

Novza metro...

#backend #nestjs 
Company: Datagaze is a national company with 5+ years of experience in cyber security.

Position: Senior backend developer.
–°ompetence: Develop the back end of the new project in the field of cyber security.

Programming language: TypeScript.
Framework: ExpressJS, NestJS.
Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB.
Technology: Microservice architecture, ELK, CI/CD, CDN, SaaS, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker, Git, Swagger.
Requirements: SOLID principles, design patterns, deep understanding of REST, test driven development, scalability and performance optimization, asynchronous programming, OOP.

Language: Uzbek (native), english (advanced).
Required: Own portfolio, 5+ years of experience.

Busyness: At the office, full time (or part time).
Salary: $2000+.

We offer: Unique project, a good office in Tashkent (near to the Oybek metro station), on time salary, young and friendly team, corporate dinners.

Details: Other details will be discussed in the face to face meeting.

Attention: Students, interns may not work with us currently.

For sending CV: @datagaze_pm


üëâ –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª @UzDev_Jobs

#react
Cosinus IT companiyasiga  React  dasturchi kerak 

Vazifalar:
- Veb ilovalarni React va Reduxda ishlab chiqish va ularni ta'minlash
- Dizaynerlar va boshqa komanda a'zolari bilan ishlash, foydalanuvchi interfeysini yaratish uchun
- API bilan integratsiya va backend bilan aloqani ta'minlash

#fullstack 
neoeco is the cutting-edge ESG Accounting Software provider based in London, United Kingdom. We are looking for a self-starter, product focused Senior Full Stack Engineer to directly work with our CTO and our founders to lead and grow our Product Engineering team.

Location: Remote (with the opportunity to relocate to London)
Salary: from $3000
Schedule: Monday-Friday, 9-5pm UK time or Tashkent time

Responsibilities:
- Actively participate in the development of our product
- Writing unit and e2e for robustness, edge cases, usability, reliability
- Conduct code reviews
- Contribute to documentation
- Participate in hiring

Requirements:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in software development
- Minimum 3 years of experience with React/Next.js, Node and Typescript
- Minimum 3 years of experience with SQL databases (Postgres) and ORMs (Prisma)
- Experience with integrating accounting and ERP softwares is a plus
- Experience with the rest of our tech stack is a plus

Our Tech Stack:
- React/Next.js, MUI, Node, Typescript, tRPC, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Nango (for integrations), AWS (ECS, Fargate, RDS, Cloudwatch), Terraform, Docker, GitHub, Jira

Our Offer:
- Salary from $3000
- Work from anywhere
- As an early member of the team, opportunities to level up to leadership positions
- Online courses
- Opportunity to relocate to London in the future

Apply here: https://neoeco.bamboohr.com/careers/30?source=aWQ9MjQ%3D
